pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider x Super Sentai: Super Hero Taisen (2012, movie)$(br2)Used to access (Dark) Decade's $(l:decade/riders/decade#ichigo)Ichigo$(/l) form$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:ichigo/riders/ichigo)Kamen Rider Ichigo$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l)
